register.description: Control Register to Enable/Disable and select modes of operation

bitfield.description: Position of RED in first 4x2 window of 4x4 pixel RGBIR pixel pattern. configure such that RED pixel will be at [row%2]*4+col%4 in 4x4 RGBIR pixel pattern
Enable for IR Remap LUT. 0 : Disable IR remap LUT. IR data sent directly 1 : Enable IR Remap LUT function
Control to select Bayer or IR to output on Bayer output channel. 0 : IR Subtracted bayer is sent 1: Pre Remap Lut IR is sent
Control for smoothening filtering of IR Subtraction Factor. 0 : smoothening Filter is disabled 1 : smoothening Filter is enabled Valid when IRSubtractEn is set
Control for IR Subtraction from Bayer output. 0 : IR subtraction from Bayer is disabled 1 : IR subtraction from Bayer is enabled
Output color on IR pixels. 0 : Interpolate B at IR positions and R at B locations 1: Interpolate R at IR positions and B at R locations
Interpolation method used for RB and IR upsampling interpolation. 0 : Constant Hue 1 : Color Difference
Control to output IR Output Channel by PCID block. 0 : Disable 1 : Enable Note that IR needs to calculated internally for IR subtraction
Control to output data on Bayer Output Channel by PCID block. 0 : Disable 1 : Enable

register.description: Actual frame size is configured value + 1

bitfield.description: Number of Lines per frame. Actual Frame height is HEIGHT +1. Actual frame height should minimum of 32 and multiple of 4. Max width supported is 8188
Number of pixels per line. Actual Frame width is WIDTH +1. Actual frame width should minimum of 64 and multiple of 4. Max width supported by logic is 8192 and limited by line memory size of 2688

register.description: Threshold Configuration for R/B/Ir interpoaltion processing

bitfield.description: T2 Threshold in U16 format.
T1 Threshold in U16 format. Recommandated T1 < T2 < T3

register.description: Threshold Configuration for R/B/Ir interpoaltion processing

bitfield.description: T3 Threshold in U16 format.

register.description: Portion of green high frequency component mixed with interpolated R/B/Ir

bitfield.description: Portion of green high frequency component mixed with interpolated Ir values in color difference IR interpolation method in U9Q8 format. Max value supported is 256
Portion of green high frequency component mixed with interpolated R/B values in color difference R/B interpolation Method in U9Q8 format. Max value supported is 256
Threshold for Ir subtraction in U16 format. When R/G/B pixel values at a locations in the input are above this threshold no IR subtraction is performed (i.e. Ir subtraction factor == 0)
Reciprocal of TransitionRange in U9Q8 format (i.e. 8-bit of decimal with 1-bit of integer). SW driver needs to generate this from TransitionRange to avoid HW divider
Range of gray levels just below IRSubCFG1.Thrshld where Ir subtraction factor linearly changes from 1 at IRSubCFG1.Thrshld - IRSubCFG2.TransitionRange and 0 above IRSubCFG1.Thrshld. Is in U8 format

register.description: City Block Distance based IR Subtraction Scale factor LUT. Scales are used in Pre smoothing filter factor calculation

bitfield.description: L1 norm of City Block Distance 1 Scale Filter. Max value supported is 256
L1 norm of City Block Distance 0 Scale Filter. Max value supported is 256

register.description: Distance based IR Subtraction Scale factor LUT. Scales are used in Pre smoothing filter factor calculation

bitfield.description: L1 norm of City Block Distance 3 Scale Filter. Max value supported is 256
L1 norm of City Block Distance 2 Scale Filter. Max value supported is 256

register.description: Distance based IR Subtraction Scale factor LUT. Scales are used in Pre smoothing filter factor calculation

bitfield.description: L1 norm of City Block Distance 4 Scale Filter. Max value supported is 256

register.description: IR Subtraction Factor after smoothening Factor Filter

bitfield.description: Ir Subtraction factor scale for [0][1] co-ordinates in Bayer 2x2 pattern. Represented in U9Q8 format and Max value supported is 511
Ir Subtraction factor scale for [0][0] co-ordinates in Bayer 2x2 pattern. Represented in U9Q8 format and Max value supported is 511

register.description: IR Subtraction Factor after smoothening Factor Filter

bitfield.description: Ir Subtraction factor scale for [1][1] co-ordinates in Bayer 2x2 pattern. Represented in U9Q8 format and Max value supported is 511
Ir Subtraction factor scale for [1][0] co-ordinates in Bayer 2x2 pattern. Represented in U9Q8 format and Max value supported is 511

register.description: Set on internal interupt event and clr by SW

bitfield.description: status/clear for mmr configuration error. Set when Config access happen to LUT memory in the middle of processing

Select Line memory to do MMR access. 0 - 7 : Input Line buffer (32-bit max_line_width/2 entries) 8 - 12 : Up-Sampled new green pixel Line memory (32-bit max_line_width/4 entries) 13 - 17 : IR Subtraction Factor Line memory (18-bit max_line_width/2 entries)
Enable for EOF at PCID IR output channel
Enable for EOL at PCID IR output channel
Enable for EOF at PCID Bayer output channel
Enable for EOL at PCID Bayer output channel
Enable for SOF at PCID input
Enable for SOL at PCID input
Enable debug features, set to '0' to disable all debug events

register.description: Set/Clear for PCID debug events and corresponding event capture is enabled in DBG_CTL register

bitfield.description: Status/Clear for EOF at PCID IR output channel. Set on EOF at PCID IR output channel
Status/Clear for EOL at PCID IR output channel. Set on EOL at PCID IR output channel
Status/Clear for EOF at PCID Bayer output channel. Set on EOF at PCID Bayer output channel
Status/Clear for EOL at PCID Bayer output channel. Set on EOL at PCID Bayer output channel
Status/Clear for SOF at PCID input. Set on SOF at PCID input
Status/Clear for SOL at PCID input. Set on SOL at PCID input
